name: Dark Boots <*Red Glow*>
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It modifies the user's healing rate.
